snippet.title: Star Ocean The Second Story R - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the demo here: https://www.starocean2r.com

STAR OCEAN THE SECOND STORY R available for Nintendo Switch™, PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4 and PC via STEAM® on November 2nd 2023.

Discover deep gameplay features! The new "Break" system, Bonus Gauge, and Assault Action to create your own original battle style!

During the game, your party will split up at certain points and temporarily go their own ways, letting your protagonist have individual story events with them. These Private Actions can affect how the other characters see you, and some may even lead to major changes in the overall plot.

Make your own all-powerful weapons and armor! Discover Super Specialties, play minigames, become a fishing master in waterfronts, and much more!

Follow us for all the latest on Star Ocean The Second Story R:
Website: https://starocean2r.square-enix-games.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/StarOcean
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/starocean/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/staroceangame/
Threads: https://www.threads.net/@staroceangame
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@SquareEnix
#StarOcean
